userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

description.description: A brief description of the agent's purpose.

goals.description: A list of goals for the agent.

temperature.description: Controls the creativity of the agent's responses. 0 is deterministic, 1 is highly creative.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this agent.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the agent was created.

rateLimiting.description: Configuration for rate limiting user interactions.

maxMessages.description: The maximum number of messages a user can send within the timeframe.

timeframe.description: The duration of the time window in seconds.

limitExceededMessage.description: The message to display when the rate limit is exceeded.

welcomeMessage.description: The initial message the agent displays to the user.

isWelcomeMessageEnabled.description: Determines if the welcome message is active.

isDisplayNameEnabled.description: Determines if the display name is shown in the chat widget.

logoUrl.description: The URL of the agent's logo.

agentText.title: Agent Text Source
agentText.description: A text-based knowledge source for an agent.

title.description: The title of the text source.

content.description: The full content of the text source.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the text source was created.

agentFile.title: Agent File Source
agentFile.description: A file-based knowledge source for an agent.

type.description: The MIME type of the file.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

url.description: The public URL to access the file.

storagePath.description: The path to the file in the storage bucket.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the file was uploaded.

extractedText.description: The extracted text content of the file.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/agents/{agentId}.description: Stores the agents created by a specific user.

/users/{userId}/agents/{agentId}/texts/{.description: Stores text-based knowledge sources for a specific agent.

/users/{userId}/agents/{agentId}/files/{.description: Stores file-based knowledge sources for a specific agent.
